summary: This bill, the Space National Guard Establishment Act of 2025, establishes a Space National Guard as a reserve component of the Space Force. It specifies the states included (Alaska, California, Colorado, Florida, Hawaii, New York, Ohio), outlines the composition, including the Director of Space Operations and the transfer of existing space operations units.  The bill prohibits additional personnel and new construction, mandates implementation within a year, and requires briefings to congressional defense committees. Conforming amendments define the Space National Guard in Title 10 and 32 of the U.S. Code.
